title: Hello Programming 2023: An Hour of Code with Mapúa MCL-ACM
description: Mapúa MCL-ACM Student Chapter hosted its annual Hour of Code event at Santa Rosa Science And Technology High School (SRSTHS) and Cabuyao Integrated National High School (CINHS). This year, the Hour of Code theme is Creativity with Artificial Intelligence (AI). The overall programming activity ran for an hour and was split into two activities. The teaching session lasted for 40 minutes, followed by the creation of an application where the participants were given 20 minutes to create an image processing application. The topics covered during the lecture were: Variables, Data Types, Operators, Control Flow, and Functions. Facilitators and mentors have assisted the participants in effectively creating a face detection application, which was an exciting output.
summary: Mapúa MCL-ACM Student Chapter hosted its annual “Hello Programming 2023: An Hour of Code” event at Santa Rosa Science And Technology High School (SRSTHS) and Cabuyao Integrated National High School (CINHS)
